casebody.data:
Charles D. BARRY et al., Plaintiffs in Error, v. R. M. BAILEY COMPANY, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 1, 1926.) No. 361. Fraser, Speir & Meyer (Schuyler M. Meyer and John L. Dunn, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiffs in error. *1013Booth & Hewitt, of New York City (Enos S. Booth, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
